entries.name: new(ts)
entries.desc: Creates a new TupleSpaceProxy to wrap ts.

entries.name: notify(ev, tuple, sec=nil)
entries.desc: Registers for notifications of event ev on the proxied TupleSpace. See Rinda::TupleSpace#notify

entries.name: read(tuple, sec=nil, &block)
entries.desc: Reads tuple from the proxied TupleSpace.  See Rinda::TupleSpace#read.

entries.name: read_all(tuple)
entries.desc: Reads all tuples matching tuple from the proxied TupleSpace.  See Rinda::TupleSpace#read_all.

entries.name: take(tuple, sec=nil, &block)
entries.desc: Takes tuple from the proxied TupleSpace.  See Rinda::TupleSpace#take.

entries.name: write(tuple, sec=nil)
entries.desc: Adds tuple to the proxied TupleSpace.  See Rinda::TupleSpace#write.
